text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: And so, you have a suggestion for me?
choice_data_list: I thought of some necessary training
I thought of some necessary training

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
choice_data_list: (If I say that, she'll definitely look)
(If I say that, she'll definitely look)

text_block_list.text:
There was no way she would refuse an opportunity to grow stronger. 
That's why I prepared a lot of materials. Researching past runs――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ……Is this all?
choice_data_list: Eh?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Wasn't this training method published in a paper last week? 
Besides, pressuring from the inside is my forte.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
It's fine to focus on strengths, but doesn't that narrow 
down my options in regards to tactics? Since I haven't 
debuted, wouldn't it be better to focus on my weaknesses?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
……Don't tell me. 
You don't even know that theory――
choice_data_list: I know, I've also prepared alternatives

text_block_list.text:
And so, from that day on, the training 
to make Gentildonna "Stronger" began.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: 200m, 8 times……is something like this enough?
choice_data_list: Do it faster each time

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Well……that's fine. Then maybe I should just 
swim the first one at a leisurely pace?
choice_data_list: You wouldn't really do that, would you?
You wouldn't really do that, would you?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm. So use these weights for training……I see.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ……With something this light and soft?
choice_data_list: (You've gotta be kidding me……)
(You've gotta be kidding me……)

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
So before cooldown, you want me to run 15-15 intervals? 
Even in the end you won't let me run full speed?
choice_data_list: It should be easy if you're disciplined

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Heh……my, how strict.

Gentildonna descended on to the course. This was a competition 
between my ability to instruct and Gentildonna's ability to grow.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
――11, 12, 13……! ……15! 
Just like this, another 200……!

Gentildonna ran the 15-15 interval as instructed…… 
she ran 1 furlong 【200m】 in exactly 15 seconds. 
Her internal clock was pretty accurate.
choice_data_list: (……She can do it so easily)
(……She can do it so easily)

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ……Fufuu. Ufufu――……!

Her comprehension abilities were extraordinary. So was her 
growth potential. Every time she trained, it would feel like 
my creativity and cognitive abilities would be put to the test.
choice_data_list: ……but I can't complain.

text_block_list.text:
I had already decided. I'll prove that my guidance is second 
to none, as many times as it takes. The stronger she becomes, 
the harder I need to work. ……that's all it means.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Ara, so you were here.
choice_data_list: Gentildonna? Huh, but today――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Which rotation do you want me to take?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
You have one in mind don't you? Like competing for the glory 
of Japan's #1 in the 『Japan Derby』. Or maybe……the title of 
strongest in the world at the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』?
choice_data_list: ……first, what do you want to do?
……first, what do you want to do?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
First, the Triple Tiara rotation. 
After all――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ――for me, a gorgeous tiara would be most fitting, wouldn't it?
choice_data_list: The Tiara! That would look good on you!
The Tiara! That would look good on you!

text_block_list.text:
The Triple Tiara rotation――one of the classic 
rotations. The races that were a part of 
that were the 『Oka Sho』『Oaks』 and 『Shuuka Sho』.

I'm pretty sure an additional prize of the Triple Tiara was an 
actual tiara. It would definitely look really good on her.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
……the others said that I could handle the Derby. And some 
have recommended the Classic Triple Crown rotation, though?
choice_data_list: Well, that's one possible route……

text_block_list.text:
Normally, running for the Classic Triple Crown, which 
included the Derby, was considered how Uma Musume would 
get the strongest. But for her, any route she chose――
choice_data_list: Any route you choose――you'll become the strongest
Any route you choose――you'll become the strongest

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ……Heh

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Ufufufuu!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
……True. What's important is not what you 
accomplish. It's how strong you become.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
It seems we'll be together for a long time. 
Now, let's form a contract. Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Before I change my mind, could you prepare a contract?
choice_data_list: ……! Got it, I'll get it ready soon

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Fufufuu……! 
Ah――but one more thing.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: For the sake of the future……how about starting with this?
choice_data_list: ……? Start with what?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ……heh.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Are you not familiar with etiquette when dealing 
with a lady? Are those lips just for decoration?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
……Well? 
I've got high expectations for you, Trainer.
And so, the lady sweetly smiled, as if testing me.
